Recipes.RecipeIngredient: Pizza dough, pizza sauce, mozzarella, cheery tomatoes, basil leaves, red pepper flakes, extra-virgin olive oil
Recipes.RecipeInstruction: Preheat the oven to 500 degree F. Spread the pizza sauce and put mozzarella and tomatoes on the pizza dough. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven. Add fresh basil leaves and pepper flakes. Drizzle with olive oil

Recipes.RecipeIngredient: Bricket, meaty bones, pho noodles, onion, sugar, salt, fish sauce, lemongrass
Recipes.RecipeInstruction: Add water and meat to pot. Boil for 5 minutes with onions, ginger, and lemongrass. Remove scum if needed. Rinse the meat with cold water and put it back into the pot. Simmer for 3 hours. Add fish sauce and sugar. Remove the meat but leave the bones. Cook the pho noodles. Add meat and broth.

Recipes.RecipeIngredient: Mayonnaise, mustard, toasted bread, lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, sliced ham, bason
Recipes.RecipeInstruction: Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Spread the mixture on 2 slices of bread. add lettuce, tomato, cheese, ham, or other desired meat. Top the empty slice with the full slice.

Recipes.RecipeIngredient: Olive oil, garlic cloves, butter, chicken broth, ground black pepper, salt, spaghetti, Parmesan cheese, heavy cream
Recipes.RecipeInstruction: Heat olive oil. Add garlic and stir for 1 to 2 minutes. Add butter and stir until melted. Add chicken broth. Add salt and pepper then boil. Add spaghetti and cook for 10 minutes. Extract spaghetti. Add cheese, cream, and mix.

Recipes.RecipeIngredient: Rice, eggs, cooking oil, shrimps, fish sauce, chopped carrot
Recipes.RecipeInstruction: Add oil. Add shrimps. Cook well then remove. Add eggs. Add rice and carrot. Add cooked shrimps. Add seasonings.
